card.name: Abomination
card.text: Whenever Abomination blocks or becomes blocked by a green or white creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Alabaster Potion
card.text: Choose one - Target player gains X life; or prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Aladdin's Lamp
card.text: {X}, {T}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead look at the top X cards of your library, put all but one of them on the bottom of your library in a random order, then draw a card. X can't be 0.

card.name: Aladdin's Ring
card.text: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Ali Baba
card.text: {R}: Tap target Wall.

card.name: Amrou Kithkin
card.text: Amrou Kithkin can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.

card.name: Amulet of Kroog
card.text: {2}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Angry Mob
card.text: Trample As long as it's your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Swamps your opponents control. As long as it's not your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each 2.

card.name: Animate Artifact
card.text: Enchant artifact As long as enchanted artifact isn't a creature, it's an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Animate Dead
card.text: Enchant creature card in a graveyard When Animate Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it. Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.

card.name: Animate Wall
card.text: Enchant Wall Enchanted Wall can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Ankh of Mishra
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

card.name: Apprentice Wizard
card.text: {U}, {T}: Add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Armageddon
card.text: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Armageddon Clock
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a doom counter on Armageddon Clock. At the beginning of your draw step, Armageddon Clock deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to each player. {4}: Remove a doom counter from Armageddon Clock. Any player may activate this ability but only during any upkeep step.

card.name: Ashes to Ashes
card.text: Exile two target nonartifact creatures. Ashes to Ashes deals 5 damage to you.

card.name: Ashnod's Battle Gear
card.text: You may choose not to untap Ashnod's Battle Gear during your untap step. {2}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/-2 for as long as Ashnod's Battle Gear remains tapped.

card.name: Aspect of Wolf
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +X/+Y, where X is half the number of Forests you control, rounded down, and Y is half the number of Forests you control, rounded up.

card.name: Backfire
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to you, Backfire deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Bad Moon
card.text: Black creatures get +1/+1.

card.name: Balance
card.text: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

card.name: Ball Lightning
card.text: Trample Haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

card.name: Battering Ram
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, Battering Ram gains banding until end of combat. Whenever Battering Ram becomes blocked by a Wall, destroy that Wall at end of combat.

card.name: Birds of Paradise
card.text: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Black Knight
card.text: First strike Protection from white

card.name: Black Mana Battery
card.text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Black Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Black Mana Battery: Add {B} to your mana pool, then add an additional {B} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Black Vise
card.text: As Black Vise enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Black Vise deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus 4.

card.name: Black Ward
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from black. This effect doesn't remove Black Ward.

card.name: Blessing
card.text: Enchant creature {W}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Blight
card.text: Enchant land When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.

card.name: Blood Lust
card.text: If target creature has toughness 5 or greater, it gets +4/-4 until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +4/-X until end of turn, where X is its toughness minus 1.

card.name: Blue Elemental Blast
card.text: Choose one - Counter target red spell; or destroy target red permanent.

card.name: Blue Mana Battery

card.name: Blue Ward

card.name: Bottle of Suleiman

card.name: Brainwash
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Brass Man
card.text: Brass Man doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}. If you do, untap Brass Man.

card.name: Bronze Tablet
card.text: Remove Bronze Tablet from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. Bronze Tablet enters the battlefield tapped. {4}, {T}: Exile Bronze Tablet and target nontoken permanent an opponent owns. That player may pay 10 life. If he or she does, put Bronze Tablet into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player owns Bronze Tablet and you own the other exiled card.

card.name: Brothers of Fire

card.name: Clockwork Avian
card.text: Flying Clockwork Avian enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Avian attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Clockwork Beast
card.text: Clockwork Beast enters the battlefield with seven +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.text: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.

card.name: Orcish Oriflamme
card.text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Osai Vultures
card.text: Flying At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a carrion counter on Osai Vultures. Remove two carrion counters from Osai Vultures: Osai Vultures gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Paralyze
card.text: Enchant creature When Paralyze enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If he or she does, untap the creature.

card.name: Personal Incarnation
card.text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Personal Incarnation this turn is dealt to its owner instead. Any player may activate this ability, but only if he or she owns Personal Incarnation. When Personal Incarnation dies, its owner loses half his or her life, rounded up.

card.name: Pestilence
card.text: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence. {B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Phantasmal Forces
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Phantasmal Forces unless you pay {U}.

card.text: Blocking creatures get +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Pikemen
card.text: First strike; banding

card.name: Pirate Ship
card.text: Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to target creature or player. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.

card.name: Pit Scorpion
card.text: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter.

card.name: Plague Rats
card.text: Plague Rats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures named Plague Rats on the battlefield.

card.name: Power Leak
card.text: Enchant enchantment At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. Power Leak deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.

card.name: Power Sink
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands with mana abilities he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.

card.name: Power Surge
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Power Surge deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands he or she controlled at the beginning of this turn.

card.name: Pradesh Gypsies
card.text: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Primal Clay
card.text: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types.

card.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
card.text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Psionic Entity
card.text: {T}: Psionic Entity deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to itself.

card.name: Psychic Venom

card.name: Purelace
card.text: Target spell or permanent becomes white.

card.name: Pyrotechnics

card.name: Rag Man
card.text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals his or her hand and discards a creature card at random. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: Raise Dead
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Rebirth
card.text: Remove Rebirth from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. Each player may put the top card of his or her library into the ante. If a player does, his or her life total becomes 20.

card.name: Red Elemental Blast
card.text: Choose one - Counter target blue spell; or destroy target blue permanent.

card.name: Red Mana Battery
card.text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Red Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Red Mana Battery: Add {R} to your mana pool, then add an additional {R} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Red Ward
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from red. This effect doesn't remove Red Ward.

card.name: Regeneration

card.name: Relic Bind
card.text: Enchant artifact an opponent controls Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, choose one - Relic Bind deals 1 damage to target player; or target player gains 1 life.

card.name: Reverse Damage
card.text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

card.name: Righteousness
card.text: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

card.name: Rod of Ruin

card.name: Sandstorm

card.name: Scavenging Ghoul

card.name: Sea Serpent
card.text: Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Sea Serpent.

card.name: Seeker

card.name: Shapeshifter
card.text: As Shapeshifter enters the battlefield, choose a number between 0 and 7. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a number between 0 and 7. Shapeshifter's power is equal to the last chosen number and its toughness is equal to 7 minus that number.

card.name: Shatter
card.text: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Shivan Dragon

card.name: Simulacrum
card.text: You gain life equal to the damage dealt to you this turn. Simulacrum deals damage to target creature you control equal to the damage dealt to you this turn.

card.name: Sindbad
card.text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

card.name: Siren's Call
card.text: Cast Siren's Call only during an opponent's turn, before attackers are declared. Creatures the active player controls attack this turn if able. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy all non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack this turn. Ignore this effect for each creature the player didn't control continuously since the beginning of the turn.

card.name: Sisters of the Flame

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Sylvan Library
card.text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

card.name: Tawnos's Wand
card.text: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Tawnos's Weaponry
card.text: You may choose not to untap Tawnos's Weaponry during your untap step. {2}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 for as long as Tawnos's Weaponry remains tapped.

card.name: Tempest Efreet
card.text: Remove Tempest Efreet from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. {T}, Sacrifice Tempest Efreet: Target opponent may pay 10 life. If that player doesn't, he or she reveals a card at random from his or her hand. Exchange ownership of the revealed card and Tempest Efreet. Put the revealed card into your hand and Tempest Efreet from anywhere into that player's graveyard.

card.name: Terror
card.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Tetravus
card.text: Flying Tetravus enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from Tetravus. If you do, put that many 1/1 colorless Tetravite artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield. They each have flying and "This creature can't be enchanted." At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile any number of tokens put onto the battlefield with Tetravus. If you do, put that many +1/+1 counters on Tetravus.
